reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress's quality excellent and appreciate its gorgeous color. The fabric receives positive feedback for its nice material, with one customer describing it as buttery soft. Regarding size, while some find it true to size, others report the waist being too big. The material thickness receives mixed reviews, with several customers noting it's thin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely a winner!
items.body: This dress is SO worth the money. I was worried that it would be thin, but it is a thick yet buttery soft material that is almost like a high-quality tracksuit material. But it looks like silk. The color is gorgeous and will be perfect for the cosplay I am using it for this Halloween! I am 5 foot five and 140 pounds and wear a 34b bra - I ordered a small because I wanted it to be tight and seriously, it fits like a glove. I could not be more pleased with this dress. I figured I would only wear it for my costume, but it is good enough quality that I can even re-wear it to a dressy event. Read more
items.author: Fran kovatch

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome dress!!
items.body: I loved the dress. The quality is excellent. If you're short, it will be very long on you. Read more
items.author: CHIMERE

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size down! You’ll still have room.
items.body: Beautiful dress but definitely size down! I’m 5’9 and my measurements are 34 27 37 so I ordered a medium. But the dress was so baggy I had to return and order a small. The small was much better. Very beautiful and form fitting yet breathable and stretchy. Read more
items.author: Nyaa Bruce

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Rungs large
items.body: This runs so big! I went by the measurements provided and have had to return and order a smaller size twice. I love the look and feel of the dress which is why I haven’t given up yet. Looking forward to seeing what it looks like in the correct size. There’s also a lot of stretch to the material. Read more
items.author: Marie S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect formal gown
items.body: This dress is so beautiful in person. It also came pretty face. I might smell but nothing too drastic. I did have to have the waist pulled in a bit but that's it Read more
items.author: Shakira York

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cheap fabric, not as pictured
items.body: Fabric is a slinky, fake satin. Thin, doesn't have a lining on the main part of the dress, only on the bust. It's a little baggy in the tummy. It looks like the temu version of the picture. They clearly stole the picture of another garment and they are selling something different. Read more
items.author: Vienne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: I loved this dress and the materials of the fabric. This was an awesome buy. Read more
items.author: Tao Vang

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The waist part is big.
items.body: I wore it to a wedding. The waist was too big so I ended up taking it in my self in the back which took 5 minutes. Beside that it fit perfect. I ordered a medium. I’m 5’8’’ 155 lbs. Read more
items.author: alexandria

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Sleeveless Maxi V Neck High Split Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Sleeveless Maxi V Neck High Split Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Purple, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
